title: [娱乐]snowball machine gun---雪球机枪[1.2.3-R2.0]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 09:13 编辑 

大家我又来给大家带上插件了

这次的插件
..还是娱乐的

这个插件输入个命令，你就可以比平时发的雪球快的多

命令只有一个
/smg 切换机枪模式
权限也只有一个
snowballmachinegun.smg - 使玩家能够用雪球机枪的能力。 

原文
Snowball Machine Gun
This is a fairly simple plugin, however it is quite entertaining. When toggled, you will shoot snowballs at a very rapid rate while you move around. This is one of my first plugins that I actually release publicly. I appreciate all feedback and suggestions.
Future
In the future I plan on adding different commands and features. Some of these may include an egg "machine gun". I was also thinking about adding a feature in which the snowballs create an explosion where they land. Another idea I had was a mode where damage is inflicted on the player after being hit with a snowball.
These are just ideas. I'm open to suggestions.
Usage
/smg - Toggles the snowball machine gun (SMG) mode.
Permissions
snowballmachinegun.smg - Gives users the ability to use the snowball machine gun.
This plugin is going under a major rewrite. We are going to have a couple new features with this plugin.
